General.Name: CS Corporation
General.Description: CS Corporation manufactures and sells IT equipment for telecommunication companies worldwide. It offers distributed antenna systems; and RF repeaters and interference cancellation systems that provides a solution to enhance 3G/4G/5G mobile coverage for indoor and outdoor. The company was formerly known as C&S Microwave Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CS Corporation in March 2010. CS Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
